obs = hs.consecutive_days_of_observations(sensor_id, devices_file,
    cycles_df, sensors_df, geospatial_df=geospatial_df,
    include_first_and_last_days=include_first_last_days)
assert isinstance(obs, pd.DataFrame)
assert len(obs) > 0
pytest.mark.parametrize(
    'sensor_id, devices_file, cycles_df, sensors_df, geospatial_df, include_first_last_days'
    , [(92, TEST_SENSORS_FILE, cycle_df_fixture(), sensor_df_fixture(),
    geospatial_df_fixture(), False)])
